alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 11:19PM CDT until April 23 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wichita County in west central Kansas... Greeley County in west central Kansas... * Until 1100 PM MDT/midnight CDT/. * At 1019 PM MDT/1119 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles south of Weskan to 12 miles west of Horace to near Towner, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Horace and Tribune. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
